attributes.action: have all MP's take a decrease in salary or have pay rises frozen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seeing as some public sectors have had their pay rises cancelled, or even their salaries cut, why should our MP's not lead by example and take a cut in their salaries or at the very least have no pay rises until the economic trouble of our country has been alleviated.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
